name: INDEPENDENT COMMUNITY BANKERS OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Implementation and reform of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (P.L.111-203), Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) reform, systemic risk, ending "too big to fail", GSE reform, capital requirements, regulatory relief for community banks including S. 2155, mortgage lending reform and tax relief for community banks. Financial Services Authorization and Financial Services and General Government Appropriations bills, Sub-Chapter S tax relief.

Implementation and reform of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (P.L.111-203), Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) reform, systemic risk, ending "too big to fail", GSE reform, capital requirements, regulatory relief for community banks including S. 2155 implementation, mortgage lending reform and tax relief for community banks. Financial Services Authorization and Financial Services and General Government Appropriations bills, Sub-Chapter S tax relief. Senate confirmation of financial regulators.

Financial Services Authorization and Financial Services and General Government Appropriations bills, Sub-Chapter S tax relief.  Senate confirmation of financial regulators.
